name: @odh-dashboard/feature-store
description: Feature store plugin for managing feature engineering and data pipelines.

scripts.test:cypress:coverage: npx concurrently -k -s first "npm run cypress:server:build:coverage && npm run cypress:server" "npm run cypress:server:wait && npm run cypress:run:mock:coverage"
scripts.cypress:run:mock:coverage: rimraf ../../packages/cypress/coverage ../../packages/cypress/.nyc_output && cross-env CY_COVERAGE=true CY_MOCK=1 CY_WS_PORT=9002 cypress run -b chrome --project ../../packages/cypress --spec '../../packages/cypress/cypress/tests/mocked/featureStore/**/*.cy.ts'
scripts.coverage:merge: rimraf coverage && istanbul-merge --out coverage/coverage-final.json jest-coverage/coverage-final.json ../../packages/cypress/coverage/coverage-final.json && nyc report --reporter html --reporter text-summary -t coverage --report-dir coverage/report
